articles.description: The Raging Bull of Sant’Agata Bolognese pioneered the modern supercar with the oh-so-beautiful Miura in the 1960s. General Motors also experimented...
articles.content: Porsche is notorious for improving the breed without straying from the 911’s tried-and-true formula. GM, however, did it before Zuffenhausen’s favorite son with the Corvette. For example, a guy calle… [+2416 chars]
